name: Dwarfs can't swim
description:
Dwarfs can't swim is a gamejam-project created with the Unity-Engine 5.0.

The game was created at a gamejam that was held during March of 27-29 of 2015 at Högskolan i Skövde.

The game is an endless runner in which you jump and slide to avoid spikes while collecting jewels. The twist is that you are running inside a dark tunnel and you have to use your miner light to scout ahead.
